body_content.explanation: (of a metal object or material) not able to attract objects or materials containing iron or steel:
examples: In the experiment, half the participants had strong magnets, while the rest had non-magnetic metal bars.

body_content.explanation: not able to be attracted by a magnet (= an object that is able to attract iron and steel objects):
examples: The metal detector is able to detect firearms in magnetic and non-magnetic metals and mixed alloys.
A copper rod is used because it is a nonmagnetic material.
